mainHero.title: Making a Positive Impact with
mainHero.subtitle: AI Software
mainHero.description: At BD, we believe that technology can be a powerful tool for improving people's lives. Our team of experts is dedicated to developing cutting-edge AI software solutions that solve real-world problems and make a positive impact on people's lives. From improving healthcare outcomes to streamlining daily tasks, we're committed to helping people live better lives through technology.

primaryAction.text: See How We Can Help You

items.title: Real-time vehicle tracking
items.description: Ondebus provides real-time information on the location and arrival time of public transportation vehicles, so users can plan their trips with confidence and know exactly when their bus or metro will arrive

items.title: Payment management
items.description: With Ondebus, users can pay their public transportation fees online in one transaction or set up recurring payments, so they never have to worry about missing a payment or running out of tickets.

items.title: public transportation card management
items.description: Ondebus allows users to purchase and manage their bus or metro cards directly within the app, so they can have all of their public transportation-related information in one place.

items.title: Route planning
items.description: Ondebus provides detailed information on different public transportation routes and schedules, so users can plan their trips more efficiently and avoid delays or unexpected detours.

items.title: Push notifications
items.description: Ondebus sends push notifications to users about any changes to their planned trips, such as delays or cancellations, so they can adjust their plans accordingly.

features.title: What We Offer.
features.subtitle: All the best technologies out there!
features.description: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.

items.name: React.js
items.description: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components.

items.name: Tailwind
items.description: Tailwind CSS is a highly customizable, low-level CSS framework for quickly creating beautiful designs without any annoying opinionated stylesheet nonsense.

items.name: Next.js
items.description: Next.js is a framework for server-rendered React applications using Next.js.

items.name: Typescript
items.description: TypeScript is a programming language developed and maintained by Microsoft.
